member.name: M:WXSDKPerf.WXPerfEngine_Implementation.Annotation(System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to add an annotation to the performance data. The annotation string is uploaded to the server along with the current frame ID.
member.param: The annotation string to be added. It should not be null or empty.
member.remarks: If the provided annotation string is null or empty, an error message will be logged.
